title: Georgia Fowler dazzles at the premiere of HBO documentary Very Ralph
text:
Victoria's Secret model Georgia Fowler looked suitably angelic at the premiere of HBO film Very Ralph in New York City on Wednesday.

While arriving at the special screening, the 27-year-old showcased her flawless sense of style in a white corset-like top and matching palazzo pants.

Very Ralph is a documentary about fashion icon Ralph Lauren.

Dressed to impress: Victoria's Secret model Georgia Fowler looked suitably angelic at the premiere of HBO film Very Ralph in New York City on Wednesday

Georgia, who hails from New Zealand, completed her outfit with a pair of white, square-edged high heels.

On Tuesday evening, she had attended the launch of skincare line Noble Panacea at New York's Metropolitan Museum of Art.

Despite the rainy weather, she happily posed for photos outside the gallery's famous front steps.

Simply stunning: While arriving at the special screening, the 27-year-old showcased her flawless sense of style in a white corset-like top

Georgia went braless in a plunging black jumpsuit that highlighted her slim, statuesque figure.

Her look was teamed with gold earrings, a small black purse and a pair of Manolo Blahnik ruby heels with a bejewelled buckle across the toes.

For makeup, she opted for red lipstick in addition to feathered brows and mascara.

Beauty in black! On Tuesday evening, Georgia had attended the launch of skincare line Noble Panacea at New York's Metropolitan Museum of Art

Speaking to The Daily Telegraph last week, Georgia called for more diversity on runways - in particular the Victoria's Secret Fashion Show, which is not taking place this year.

'There should be diversity because beauty comes in all forms,' she said.

'I mean I've done [the Victoria's Secret Fashion Show] for the past three years and it was always a dream growing up to be a part of it and it's disappointing it's not going to happen this year - but who knows what will happen.'
description: Victoria's Secret model Georgia Fowler looked suitably angelic at the premiere of HBO film Very Ralph in New York City on Wednesday.
authors: Tom Place For Daily Mail Australia
